Integrations.title: Integrations
Integrations.subtitle: Below you can update the environment settings for the ADE.
Integrations.label: Environment Variables
Integrations.saveSuccess: Environment variables updated successfully, restarting the ADE server

IntegrationConfigurationDialog.title: Update connection with {integrationName}
IntegrationConfigurationDialog.description: Learn about how to connect and more about this integration <link>here</link>

openAI.description: Connect to the OpenAI API to use GPT models in the ADE

anthropic.description: Connect to the Anthropic API to use Anthropic models in the ADE

ollama.description: Connect to the Ollama API to use Ollama models in the ADE

azure.description: Connect to the Azure API to use Azure models in the ADE

composio.description: Connect to the Composio API to use Composio tools in the ADE

lmstudio.description: Connect to LM Studio to use LM Studio models in the ADE

ConnectToLetta.title: Turn on your server
ConnectToLetta.description: Run the command below in your terminal to start your server. Once your server is running, the ADE will be available

Agents.title: Agents
Agents.subtitle: View and manage your agents below.

NotConnectedOverlay.details: This should only take 10-20 seconds. Once the server is running, you will be able to access the ADE.

CreateLocalAgentDialog.serverOffline: Your server is offline, please start it to create a new agent.
CreateLocalAgentDialog.serverOfflineConnect: Turn on your server with the command below:
CreateLocalAgentDialog.isFetchingStatus: Sorry, we are still attempting to connect to your server. Please wait a moment.
CreateLocalAgentDialog.title: Create a new agent

alert.title: You are creating an agent on {serverName}
alert.descriptionLocal: This will create an agent locally on your machine. This will not deploy the agent to Letta Cloud.
alert.descriptionRemote: This will create an agent on the remote server. This will not deploy the agent to Letta Cloud.

CreateLocalAgentDialog.error: There was an error creating the agent, below is the error message, please try again or contact support.

starterKits.title: Starter kits
starterKits.description: Choose from a starter pack and customize it in the ADE, or start from scratch

ServerStatus.title: Letta Server Logs
ServerStatus.subtitle: View the status of your server and the agents connected to it.
